### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE fraudulent_activities (
    activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    description TEXT,
    activity_date TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    is_fraudulent BOOLEAN
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE fraudulent_activities SET description = 'Suspicious login activity' WHERE activity_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE fraudulent_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_type VARCHAR(255),
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_date DATE
);


CREATE TABLE suspicious_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date DATE
);


CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(255),
    user_email VARCHAR(255),
    user_address TEXT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE fraudulent_activities SET activity_description = 'Suspicious Activity Detected' WHERE activity_type = 'Fraudulent'
